body_html:
Yes, set to a different path for --eval_dir works. I see a new graph.pbtxt is created for evaluation. It is smaller than the one under --train_dir. So the root cause is if set train_dir and eval_dir to the same folder, new graph.pbtxt under validation phase will replace the old one, which lead to freeze_graph fail.

thanks a lot.

body:
Yes, set to a different path for **--eval_dir**  works. I see a new **graph.pbtxt** is created for evaluation. It is smaller than the one under **--train_dir**. So the root cause is if set train_dir and eval_dir to the same folder, new **graph.pbtxt** under validation phase will replace the old one, which lead to freeze_graph fail.

thanks a lot.
